default_route_table_id.description: ID of the default route table to manage or modify.

propagating_vgws.description: List of virtual gateways to propagate routes from, must be associated with the route table.

route.description: List of routes to associate with the default route table.
route.type: list(object({cidr_block: string, core_network_arn: string, destination_prefix_list_id: string, egress_only_gateway_id: string, gateway_id: string, instance_id: string, ipv6_cidr_block: string, nat_gateway_id: string, network_interface_id: string, transit_gateway_id: string, vpc_endpoint_id: string, vpc_peering_connection_id: string}))

tags.description: Key-value pairs to associate with the default route table for resource organization and management.

timeouts.description: Defines custom timeout durations for create, update, and delete operations on the default route table.
